author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Add tests for New-Object 
- [x] -ArgumentList and 
- [x] -ComObject
    - [ ] - STA vs MTA

comments.author: chunqingchen
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan I think this issue can be closed as all the scenarios are covered.

title: Add tests for New-Object -ArgumentList and -ComObject
